reviews.text: There food is always consistently good

I‚Äôm starting to feel me being a black Melanin woman they do not take kind to us   I‚Äôve gone there two times recommendation from another Melanin black woman when I go there the women barely speak English which  isn‚Äôt a  problem other than making snarky faces at each other when I ask questions because they can‚Äôt understand me which is rude‚ÄºÔ∏è  then there‚Äôs this I believe dominican girl at the register who told me my balance was $16 but when I use my Citibank debit card, she was charging me $17. I questioned her she goes. Oh it‚Äôs not a problem. It‚Äôs just a dollar here you can have a dollar ‚Ä¶.it‚Äôs not about it being a dollar it‚Äôs the principal  if you tell me how much it is and you charge me more,  than you‚Äôre robbing me on the DL. THEY  have so many people behind the counter for what all the spit conversations by the food. It makes no sense having 10 people behind the counter just standing there.
‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏è‚ÄºÔ∏èBTW Stay away from the salmon. It looks pretty yet its dry.
I love this place!! Breakfast lunch or dinner! Food is always fresh and never miss! Consistency is key n they  got it coming from a Brooklyn girl who love to eat!
The food is delicious üòã the best in Brooklyn
This place has amazing dominican food, however its more of a breakfast/lunch spot.  Its an order and go kind of place.

Caoba Review

Caoba is a stylish restaurant known for its vibrant atmosphere and flavorful Latin American cuisine. The menu features a variety of dishes made with fresh ingredients, including grilled meats, seafood, and creative cocktails. The ambiance is warm and inviting, making it perfect for casual dinners or special occasions. Service is generally attentive and friendly. Overall, Caoba offers a great dining experience for those who enjoy bold flavors and a lively setting.
The food taste good but two different occasions I found hair. They have to be more careful. Hairnet a must.
Food excellent.
The food is always delicious, the pernil, the ribs, the baked chicken and the yellow rice are my favorites.
Close to wear houses. Not bad for what it is..
Prices felt fair for the quality, and everything tasted satisfying without being heavy.
Food is great üëç
They close at anytime they feel like. They have an attitude serving. Place and it's surrounding is not clean but their food is the only 5 star and is the only thing making me come back.

An inexpensive & filling take out option for good Spanish food, that serves breakfast & lunch. You can grab lunch options as early as 9am from their daily cafeteria style options if you‚Äôre going to a job site where there aren‚Äôt any places to eat. Or if you‚Äôre simply on your way home. You can also order specific dishes from the menu if you‚Äôre not in a rush since those are made to order or simply call ahead. There is limited seating at high shared counter tops along the two windows for about seven people. The staff are kind & bilingual speaking English and Spanish.
Food is on point....

Food is great , but the attitudes they have when they are serving any one that can‚Äôt speak Spanish is disgusting.
I seen them quietly whisper declined to a Spanish lady, but the same person a different day said out loud to a black lady  ‚Äúyour card was declined‚Äù for the whole store to hear.
I like their food but how they treated that woman was disgusting. They need better training because they are getting comfortable. I wonder what else they may say or do.
It‚Äôs that one lady that be by the register , the man that is sometimes at the register is so nice and respectful.
Excellent  food
Good food for a good price. Better know what you want though.
Best deals in Brooklyn. Favorite restaurant üá≠üáπ‚Ä¶
It‚Äôs a perfect spot for a date night.
The food is so good, and the portions are Awesome. I was able to share.

I‚Äôve been going here for about 20 years! Mostly the same staff, always very friendly and patient especially when I want like 100 things on one plate!!
The food is always very good and hot! Never stale or leftovers! Fresh food only! Thank You for feeding the community!

Love the food but the attitudes they give is insane. Also, it says they close at 6pm on google maps and I literally went to get some food because I thought I had time and when I arrive they closed already. Please change the time that is poor customer service and you wasting customers time with the wrong time.
RECEIVED FOOD POSING FROM THIS RESTAURANT. WILL NEVER GO BACK
Great spot for Dominican food. Never disappoints. Affordable and good food. There is not a lot of seating.
Food is delicious
The food is excellent,  but the service lacks some professional service. Some people get more food than others.
Awesome

Good Authentic Dominican Food, they know how to cook, I get rice, beans & Salmon for breakfast almost every morning. They also cater. I've ordered large pans of yellow rice, stew chicken, & beans. My people loved it

The food is better before they close, however it‚Äôs usually always busy this was my go to spot but I went the other day and didn‚Äôt have enough shrimps. The lady was rude and said she couldn‚Äôt give me anything else to replace it so I paid the same price.
Food is great  but service could be better but the prices are great

I like the food. Especially the salmon and fried fish with the yellow rice and beans. They use to have a Paella that was good too. However, I don‚Äôt like that they offer delivery but you can‚Äôt get them on the phone to place and order. Especially since they stop delivering around 3pm. I‚Äôve called numerous of times both of there landlines for delivery.

The food is good, however the customer service is terrible. If you‚Äôre not Dominican or of Latin descent, they will treat you differently than the do their Hispanic customers, specifically if you are black, African American, Caribbean etc.‚Ä¶
Great food at inflation busting prices.üôÇ‚Ä¶
Good food for the perfect price. Staff is very friendly and patient. When ordering for a large party for a function, etc, they are always prompt with timing. Nice clean environment.
Food is slapping üòã üëå
Order food at 1:30 they told me 30-40 min called back at 2:20 they said it was on the way and got the food at 3:00 pm. I was only 10 min away from restaurant
The food is delicious !
Small hole in the wall with a delicious selection of home cooked Latin foods. You will not be disappointed.
Ok food but the customer service is real bad an the owner needs to be make aware of this an I‚Äôm always receiving bad customer service in Caoba
Fresh food,friendly service what more could you ask for,oh last but not least the price is always right!!!
My Sister took me there for Lunch and the Place was packed. The best Spanish food I had in a while.

Great quality Spanish food, been coming here for years and never disappoints!

@Al_Realty
Very good food  and really good low prices üëå

The food is good. I go here multiple times a month. Sometimes the food is salty, but the flavor is there & I do like the food is not greasy.
I took off 1 star for the overall rating because the prices compared to the portions are truly ridiculous. Why is rice with ONE chicken $7??? This should have been a $5 meal. Especially because they put little rice compared to other Dominican spots. But the one piece of chicken for $7 upset me üòÇ

As soon as you walk in you can smell how good the food is even before you see it. Fast and friendly service. I got the lunch special with rice & beans and roast pork. Tender, juicy and full of flavor. The prices are very reasonable. If you like good food and have respect for yourself eat at Caoba.

I ordered a medium yellow rice, beans and stewed chicken with some plantains. I wanted to add a small portion of mashed potatoes to my plate but they said it's charged as an additional side since I already have rice.

The presentation is excellent, the food looks and tastes great my only gripe is the chicken could have been cooked more. It's good as flavor goes and the portion is filling. Definetely the best spanish food in the area as others tend to be more salty. The staff seem nice.

For the largest bottle of water and my meal, I paid about $12.

Delicious Hispanic Food!  This is a $6 beans, rice & baked chicken plate. I got a few shrimp for an extra charge as well. Caoba is always busy especially during the lunch rush. The line is out the door going down the block lol.

Got the yellow rice and pinto beans with stew chicken, fried sea bass, and plantains. Platter was a generous portion and only costed 10$. Clean plate, chicken was especially delicious. Will return for the fried pork and shrimp.

Purchased a small grilled chicken and white rice. Almost couldn't believe it when she said it was 8 dollars, was expecting 6$ at most. Was end of the day so if she was gonna charge me that much for a tiny plate of food she could've atleast added the last few pieces of chicken that she left on the counter. Everytime I go here it seems like the prices get higher and higher for less and less food. To me this place is dead.

Amazing staff, great service, large selection to choose from
Latin food like mom used to make
Clean establishment, great prices

This place states packed during work hours and especially lunch time. Great smorgasbord of different foods, proteins, pasta,soup etc. Cooked fresh daily, presented well. Establishment is very clean and staff is proficient in handling the influx of hungry patrons during a short lunch period.

Give them a try!!

La comida es sabrosa pero los empleados y sus modales no compaginan, Es un restaurante para el p√∫blico donde cualquier articulo puede ser vendido sin restriction de precios. No todos queremos una comida completa en mi caso solo quer√≠a $6 de pollo frito as√≠ sean 2 piecitas vendamela. Agriamente sin dialogo me dijieron que solo venden comidas completas. Muy buen local y sabor pero necesitamos m√°s √©tica social.
Saw the long line in passing, decided to try. This is my new lunch place. Fantastic food for a great price.
Great food great service just don't try to go in there just to use the restroom or deal with Laura's she's a very violent women!! Jk..  #imhappyandfull

I went for first time as recommendation. I am looking for a place that has good food where I can order trays for a party. The staff was helpful and during a busy time which seems like it always is for them. They were able to get my order (sampling the food options) put together quickly. I will definitely be placing my party trays with them for my upcoming event. The food I ordered to sample was great and tastes home made.

The area has a limited selection of retail stores and restaurants, which makes Caoba the go-to spot for anyone working nearby.

This is one of the reasons the establishment is so cherished. Another reason is that they offer fantastic food at reasonable, if not affordable, prices. They seem to understand their role in the community by catering to the steady stream of workers and residents.

You could consider them a staple of the community.

I would recommend them any day‚Äîexcept Sundays, as they are closed. The area has a limited selection of retail stores and restaurants, which makes Caoba the go-to spot for anyone working nearby.

You could consider them a staple of the community.

I would recommend them any day‚Äîexcept Sundays, as they are closed.

This restaurant is normally great, but I didn't care for the baked chicken üçóüòû early in the morning, it was very undercooked, & I'll never order it again. That's the only reason I'm not giving 5 Stars, however their prices & customer service is appreciated.‚Ä¶

The food is delicious, but the customer service is really bad, especially the Ecuadorian lady who answered the phone; she is extremely RUDE.

La comida muy buena deliciosa pero el servicio al cliente muy malo especialmente la senora Ecuatoriana que contesta el telefono muy pesada.
Love this place. Good food reasonably priced excellent service. Take out food

For more than 5 years am been coming here to buy chicharr√≥n de pollo with NO complain or regrets  of the Staff but at this specific moment one of the new young female staff that‚Äôs there serving she‚Äôs very light skin and skinny which she denies herself to provide me with her name, have nasty attitude was serving my meal, and gave me 4 tinny piece of the chicharr√≥n de pollo with a lot of rice and beans, then I ask her if this is a meal for the price that I‚Äôm paying for, and she said YES, so I ask her very kindly if she could add more into the plate and she said NO that‚Äôs a meal, well I don‚Äôt know who‚Äôs this guy that came up to me with NO indenting of a owner or manager prefer to gave me my money expect me coming out of the restaurant Happy. There was  3 others clients beside me was complaining about her and NO one come out satisfied with Her service and we all came out with our money back. She doesn‚Äôt need to be serving with that kind of behavior making the restaurant looks bad.

I've discovered this restaurant about 5 years ago. It's such a family setting all of the workers there always Pleasant to me. The food is simply spectacular!! I've never received a bad dish. The prices are perfect for the amount of food you get and everything is always always fresh!
Great place. Only thing is they don‚Äôt open at 6am. I was there today and it was closed. You guys need to change your restaurant availability.  Other than that its a great place

So I never knew this hidden gem was located here. My co worker took me there for lunch.  The food was so delicious. Prices were affordable. I had fried shrimp, fried fish, rice, beans, plantains and rotisserie chicken. Keep up the good service. Thank you.

I dont get how people can have and keep a business in a black neighborhood & discriminate against the very people who they want business from. Theres 2 servers there that I stop letting them serve me when i went because of their negative demeanor. Finally fed up, i just stop goin. The food was really good but understanding that energy is transferable i stop giving any o my resources to businesses that dont like or appreciate doing business with blacks. I dont want nobody making me food or serving me w a dislike for ppl whom look like me.
Best food I‚Äôve had in a while. Doesn‚Äôt look like much outside so it‚Äôs easy to miss in such a busy industrial area. Definitely a diamond in the rough.

Good Good Food and the constant movement of customers coming to and fro let you know it's fresh and in demand. Great hole in the wall home cooking!
No atmosphere but aren't those always the best places to eat?
